sentence.text: The sonic Hedgehog/osteoblast differentiation signaling pathway (HH) is critical for maintaining tissue polarity in development and contributes to tumor stemness.
Important factors osteoblast differentiation1 and GLI2 were always expressed, only exceptionally one of them was lowered, suggesting the functionality of HH in all tumors tested.

Our results recognize the sensitivity of tumor cell types to GANT61 in cell culture and support a critical role for osteoblast differentiation factors in tumor progression through restraining apoptosis.
